data.name: Zombie Army 4: Zombie Charm Pack
data.detailed_description:
Nothing says you’re playing for keeps like a good severed memento! With these gore-tastic Zombie Charms, add a nasty souvenir to your weapons!
This Bundle contains the following 4 charms, usable by all characters:
• Zombie Grunt Head
• Zombie Armour Piece
• Zombie Tank Heart
• Zombie Shark Tooth
data.about_the_game:
Nothing says you’re playing for keeps like a good severed memento! With these gore-tastic Zombie Charms, add a nasty souvenir to your weapons!
This Bundle contains the following 4 charms, usable by all characters:

data.short_description: Nothing says you’re playing for keeps like a good severed memento! With these gore-tastic Zombie Charms, add a nasty souvenir to your weapons!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
